title: Secrets of Haunted House [BBN][h33t]
description:
[IMG]http://img166.imageshack.us/img166/135/h33tpresentsss3.gif[/IMG]

Secrets of Haunted House 1-46
[IMG]http://img516.imageshack.us/img516/3029/hh1lv7.jpg[/IMG]

Secrets of Haunted House is a DC bronze age horror title. It started and stopped several times before issue #15 before it continued until series end.  Later in the series, the "Mister E" character came into being competing with the likes of Johnny Peril, Dr. 13, and I, Vampire regulars of DC&#039;s other horror titles.

[IMG]http://img516.imageshack.us/img516/2388/hh46kn1.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks to all the scanners involved.

IF YOU LIKE THE BOOK, THEN BUY THE COMICS OR THE TRADES. SUPPORT YOUR LOCAL COMIC BOOK STORES AND THE INDEPENDENT PUBLISHERS!!!

Please keep seeding. :D
